fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.nodes

Class MetadataXMLNode

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.nodes.MetadataXML
      • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.nodes.MetadataXMLNode

  • public class MetadataXMLNode
extends MetadataXML
    Class for one XML node in metadata with one attribute possibility

    This very simple class is aimed to construct and write metadata XML structure.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetadataXMLNode(String tag)
      Create an empty XML node for tag String tag.
      MetadataXMLNode(String tag, MetadataXML value)
      Create an XML node for tag String tag and value MetadataXML value.
      MetadataXMLNode(String tag, String value)
      Create an XML node for tag String tag and value String value.
      MetadataXMLNode(String tag, String attributename, String attributevalue, MetadataXML value)
      Create an XML node for tag String tag and value MetadataXML value, with attribute String attributename valued as String attributevalue.
      MetadataXMLNode(String tag, String attributename, String attributevalue, String value)
      Create an XML node for tag String tag and value String value, with attribute String attributename valued as String attributevalue.

      • writeXML

        public String writeXML()
        Write the metadata in XML format.

        The root XML structure is always of node nature and this method is the only public one to write XML tree, beginning at tabs depth 0.

        Returns:
        the string
